h2_title: Wandering Wight Boss Fight and Guide
content: The Wandering Wight patrols a large clearing in the Forest of Wolves, and you can actually use this to your advantage by sneaking up behind him and charging up a heavy smash attack to start the fight, dealing big damage right out of the gate.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Wandering_Wight.md', within the main section titled 'Wandering Wight', specifically from the subsection 'Wandering Wight Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
The Wandering Wight patrols a large clearing in the Forest of Wolves, and you can actually use this to your advantage by sneaking up behind him and charging up a heavy smash attack to start the fight, dealing big damage right out of the gate.
